mapper.select: SELECT sn.studentnotice_no, sn.title, s.name, sn.submitdate FROM student_notice sn LEFT JOIN student s ON sn.student_no = s.student_no WHERE lecture_no = #{lecture_no} order by sn.studentnotice_no desc
SELECT (*) FROM student_notice sn LEFT JOIN student s ON sn.student_no = s.student_no WHERE lecture_no = #{lecture_no}
SELECT *, s.name FROM student_notice sn LEFT JOIN student s ON sn.student_no = s.student_no WHERE studentnotice_no = #{studentnotice_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT student_notice(title, content, student_no, submitdate, lecture_no, header) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{student_no}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{lecture_no}, "학생 게시판")
mapper.update: UPDATE student_notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, submitdate = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE studentnotice_no = #{studentnotice_no}
